title: Override UI Window Density
desc: Should the OS DPI settings be overridden?

title: Overridden Window Density Multiplier
desc: How many times bigger should the UI be scaled. Fractions are allowed.

title: Allow Screensaver
desc: Should the screensaver be allowed to run?

title: Show Update Notification
desc: Check for new updates on startup?

title: Play Background Images Custom Folder
desc: The user directory to pull custom background images for the play file screen from

title: Previous Machine Network Address
desc: Network address of last machine connected over network. Used for reconnect functionality

title: Allow MDI Commands When Machine Running
desc: This could allow for dangerous movements, or firmware corruption if MDI commands are used while file uploads are occuring. Use this functionality with caution.

title: Keyboard Mode
desc:
Specifies the keyboard mode to use. 
blank - choose the best option based on platform
system - keyboard from OS
dock - one virtual keyboard docked to a screen side
multi - one virtual keyboard for every widget request
systemanddock - virtual docked keyboard plus input from OS keyboard
systemandmulti - virtual docked keyboard per widget plus input from OS keyboard
